name: Ultimate color palette system – Untitled UI
description:
We're sharing the ultimate starter color palette from Untitled UI!


This color system is a purposeful set of neatly-organized color styles — the perfect starting point for any brand or project.


–––


Untitled UI is the largest UI kit and design system for Figma in the world. Kickstart any project, save thousands of hours, and level up as a designer.


✨ Learn more and preview the full version at untitledui.com ✨
